title: During quarrying operations, the water should be sprayed at least once in a day over the roads at quarry sites and nearby area
clause_text: During quarrying operations, the water should be sprayed at least once in a day over the roads at quarry sites and nearby area.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
